message: Blacks have their lives disrupted every day? Yes, mostly by other Blacks: 91% murdered by other Blacks. & Guess what? Well, when it does happen it makes huge news and we are told that there was no justification for it only to find out later that the crew and security were 100% justified as occurred in Minneapolis, MN at the US Airways incident.

Thank you Tamara. I didn't know there were two types of alerts already. Unfortunately, Adam alerts are designated to a specific building, such as a mall in the above article. An Adam alert was never issued for Adam in Aurora. I read many comments over the weekend asking why they didnt issue an Amber alert. Responses were because he wasn't abducted and because issuing too many Amber alerts is that people will begin to ignore them.
